vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with Henley Johnston and Associates, Inc., to provide material testing services during construction of the Street Reconstruction Groups 17-1006, 12-636, 17-1408; and Alley Reconstruction Groups 17-8004 and 17-7003 (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Not to exceed $236,580.00 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($218,565.00), and Street and Transportation Improvement Fund (2012 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($18,015.00)
vote.description: Authorize a professional services contract with Henley Johnston and Associates, Inc., to provide material testing services during construction of the Street Reconstruction Groups 17-1006, 12-636, 17-1408; and Alley Reconstruction Groups 17-8004 and 17-7003 (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Not to exceed $236,580.00 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($218,565.00), and Street and Transportation Improvement Fund (2012 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($18,015.00)
